verse: Here is the blessing that Moses, the man of God, gave to the Israelites before he died.
Here’s what Moses said about Reuben.
Here’s what Moses said about Judah.
Here’s what Moses said about Levi.
Here’s what Moses said about Benjamin.
Here’s what Moses said about Joseph.
Here’s what Moses said about Zebulun and Issachar.
Here’s what Moses said about Gad.
Here’s what Moses said about Dan.
Here’s what Moses said about Naphtali.
Here’s what Moses said about Asher.
